title: Microsoft Teams: Embedded CART captioning support for Teams meetings for GCC-High and DOD
description:
Teams meetings now support integration with real-time captioning providers and CART writers (Communication Access Real-Time Transcription) so that users who utilize CART captions can view the captions in the same window as their meeting.Â Item has been delayed and is being rescheduled.
GA date: June CY2022
